lead_paragraph: BMW is inviting customers in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut to rent its 328i sedan by the hour, day or week, through a pilot program called BMW on Demand.
snippet: BMW is inviting customers in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut to rent its 328i sedan by the hour, day or week, through a pilot program called BMW on Demand....

headline.print_headline: BMW Dealers To Rent Cars By the Hour
headline.main: BMW Dealers to Rent Cars by the Hour
headline.seo: BMW Dealers to Rent Cars by the Hour

abstract: BMW is inviting customers in New York, New Jersey and Connecticut to rent its 328i sedan by the hour, day or week, through a pilot program called BMW on Demand.
